import React from 'react' import FilmPoster from './FilmPoster' import Fave from './Fave' import { Card, CardBlock, CardFooter, CardTitle, CardText, Col, Row, } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Button, ButtonGroup, ButtonToolbar } from 'react-bootstrap-buttons'; const FilmRow = props => { return (
props.handleDetailsClick(props.title)}>
{props.title} {props.year}

{props.title}

{props.year}

); } export default FilmRow;
